main event: A civilian observed a disc-shaped aerial vehicle in Milwaukie, Oregon on September 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a silvery, metallic disc-shaped vehicle approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter., The object hovered and made circular flights before disappearing from view., The incident lasted about 15 minutes., The witness initially mistook it for a regular aircraft before realizing its true nature., The witness was a college instructor.
